All right, so I have an unusual Nuts and Bolts Flipped Trillby.  I can't decide what color to paint it, and am working on coming up with a name.  If someone creates and interesting name/description for it, I will reward them with a bit of metal, maybe 2 rec or 1 ref or so.  Here is an in-game pic:
 http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/594701250438707673/00BE1B879C837CBD1318AF35A011AA846D0E70FE/ 
(Sorry for semi-low quality)

And here is the page for it, it shows the coloring options.  Just your opinion on what colors looks good is fine, you don't have to put a lot of thought into it. http://wiki.teamfortress.com/wiki/Flipped_Trillby

Thanks for taking the time, leave a suggestion if you think of one.
Color it red, and name it the ancestral wrath, with a description of this hat has had the blood and bolts of your ancestors engineers and sentry guns rain upon it for generations.
Color it blue, and name it the Bouncy Blue Bowler, or color it Yellow and call it the Sunny Sunday Shade then give it the Desc: The UV Rays worst enemy (next to sun block)

My friend bought me white paint and told me to paint it that, so now it is.  I no longer need a color, but if anyone can think of a name that's fitting for the effect or color, I will still reward them.  My current plan is to name it "Fresh Nuts" and describe it "Swag."
A little simplistic I know, but I thought this video was funny and it inspired me: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hn476i40pXk (May contain content inappropriate for children, including a choking hazard (small parts))
